EmailTemplate.name: Term: 30 day Termination Notification Template
EmailTemplate.subject: NOTICE OF COMMERCIAL DEALER AGREEMENT TERMINATION (SUNPOWER CORPORATION): {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.Name}
{!Account.Name}
{!Account.BillingStreet},
{!Account.BillingCity}, {!Account.BillingState} {!Account.BillingPostalCode} Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Please take notice that by this letter, and in accordance with Section 5(b)(ii) of the SunPower Commercial Dealer Agreement between {!Account.Name} and SunPower North America, LLC (the “Agreement”), SunPower hereby terminates the Agreement, effective in 30-days (June 19, 2013) (the “Termination Date”). Upon the Termination Date, {!Account.Name} shall cease to be a SunPower Commercial Dealer. Please be aware that all surviving aspects and requirements of the Commercial Dealer Agreement remain in effect, including, without limitation, Section 5(d), Section 5(e) and Section 5(f).
<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
Accordingly, all Confidential Information (as defined in the Agreement) provided to {!Account.Name} including, without limitation, price lists, manuals, and training material must be returned or destroyed no later than the Termination Date. {!Account.Name} may not sell, trade, or otherwise profit in any way from any Confidential Information (including Customer-specific information) at any time, including after the termination of the Agreement.
The termination of the Agreement has no effect upon the existing SunPower Residential Dealer Agreement entered into between SunPower North America, LLC and {!Account.Name}. Respectfully,
Derek Noble
National Sales Director - Commercial Channel
SunPower Corporation
77 Rio Robles Phone: 408.240.5500 San Jose, CA 95134 www.sunpowercorp.com Fax: 408.240.5400
